Class MailSendingProcedure

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.client.messaging.MessageProcedure<RequestException,java.lang.Void>
      • de.iss.mv2.client.messaging.MailSendingProcedure

  • public class MailSendingProcedure
extends MessageProcedure<RequestException,java.lang.Void>
    A procedure that sends a message.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
